sqlMap.insert: INSERT into T_MAN_QUESTIONS (ID, QUESTION_NO,QUESTION_DESC, ISVALID) VALUES (#id#,#questionno#,#questiondesc#,#isvalid#)
sqlMap.update: update T_MAN_QUESTIONS set QUESTION_NO = #questionno#, QUESTION_DESC = #questiondesc#,ISVALID = #isvalid# where ID=#id#
update T_MAN_QUESTIONS set ISVALID=#isvalid# where ID=#id#
sqlMap.delete: delete from T_MAN_QUESTIONS where ID in ($value$)
